title: Bakery beat
brief_description: Gives a step-by-step account of the making of bread, using many close-ups and showing the comparison between a small two man bakery and a large automated one. This film is non-narrated with a music soundtrack and is applicable to themes of interdependence and social organization. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.
